Review Description: it was a good job at the beginning and at the end it was to boring for me because you would do the same thing everyday for the time you were working but google do treat the employees good

Title: Good work culture
Review Description: has a good work life balance the people were good and friendly the team eas very encouraging any new updates they would give us training it was competitive and there is lot of scope for learning

Title: Good place to work
Review Description: good atmosphere healthy work place employee space is very good timings are very flexible cab facility was also good during my working period but now its not the same our work station was also nice

Title: Great experience
Review Description: Worked as a Software Developer during Googles 2017 Summer of Code program Fastpaced highly educational opportunity for beginning software developers and the open source community Highly recommended

Title: Very Poor management
Review Description: Fitbit Managements are really poor Actually they have not any technical understandings and strategic planning for manufacturing tests The hardest part of the job was management failed to understand the technicality As a result Engineering communication was always in crisis mode The workplace culture was changed in the negative direction Im glad that I left

Title: Good place to learn
Review Description: Lots and lots of digging for information and conveying that to sales reps Can be difficult sometimes as they fight over account ownership and commision

Title: Amazing place for advancements
Review Description: This is a great place for making amazing advancements in career People are full of energy There is opportunity to learn new technologies Job is well paid

Title: Hard job to do
Review Description: Overall not a bad place to work I only had experience with customer support and it wasnt the job for me Working was monotonous and stressful which is why I decided not to pursue this career

Title: Ever changing workplace
Review Description: Google is a very big company which in some ways can actually feel like several different companies working together Change is a constant in the workplace and benefits are great

Title: great company culture
Review Description: As a software engineer intern I learnt a lot during the internship and get the chance of experiencing large scale project The culture the people and the benefit there are all great

Title: Google
Review Description: As a associate i learned many things i googletypical day was when there was heavy load upon us of work have to extend days to complete workgoogle culture is awesome and friendly

Title: Google Books Tech Ops Project Manager
Review Description: Responsible for troubleshooting technical issues with the Google Play Books UI ● Use technical skills to establish ways to push content out to the Public in a timely matter ● Established a lead role that involves making sure Partner’s Stakeholders request are made
Job Title: Google Books Tech Ops Project Manager

Title: Amazing experience with the worlds leading internet company
Review Description: A top notch company that provides you plenty of opportunities to break into the technologyinternet industry An amazing place to work for new grads and anyone looking for a way into the worlds greatest internet company

Title: Collaborative environment
Review Description: The environment is innovative and everyone has a voice If the area in which you are involved is not an area of extreme expertise or knowledge each person still has a voice This leads to creative solutions AND sometimes drives the business a direction that wont work now and will work later Course correcting happens a lot We are a very young 1 yr old hardware operations organization Exciting times its just in the wrong geographic location for me

Title: Best programming shcool
Review Description: Here you can become realy an advanced java programmer You can get a lot of useful expirience Take a part in some interesting and modern project with newest techologies

Title: Encourages creativity
Review Description: You are in charge of your career and are given tools and opportunities to advance yourself Software engineering is the main focus so may not be a place for nontechnical oriented people

Title: Good place to work
Review Description: As a contractor you are not expected of much performance at the same time cant excel much for career advancement Contract agents will get you in with a lower pay in the brand name of Google Just need to be tactful on that
Con: Contractors separation from Googlers Could be bullied at times

Title: fun work place
Review Description: working for google was interesting ive learned alot i work on the fiber side therefore its more construction project managment based over all it is a great place to work
Pro: the ability to work from home

Title: Great place to work
Review Description: Google takes care of its employees I have nothing to but good things to say about my experience there If given the opportunity I would work for Google again

Title: a great company
Review Description: my experience with Google has been nothing but positive the working environment is always changing and so is the location in which I am working the managers are well qualified the job at hand

Title: Amazing
Review Description: Best place to work ever People are very passionate about their job and they want to put you in the game since the first moment Very attractive and full of joy

Title: Great company
Review Description: Fast paced and fun but feels like a big company There is no culture quite like this one in terms of people you can meet and mesen from and it’s truly a good challenge

Title: Good company
Review Description: Very friendly and efficient treats its employees well I appreciate their desire to improve peoples knowledge of their products and services so that they can get the most use of out of them

Title: pleasant environment
Review Description: A typical day would be hitting meetings and reaching the target The hardest part is feeling competitive while able to reach the weekly targets The enjoyable part of the job is the nature of the job and the work environment The management was at its best while proving facilities to the employees

Title: company with many growth potentials
Review Description: Company has exciting vision and many growth opportunities Many people work long hours Teamgroup may have its own culture Company is experiencing rapid growth expansion in some areas while other business reaches mature stages

Title: Great Colleagues Poor Managment
Review Description: Little to no benefits treated as disposable No autonomy no room for advancement no recognition for good work management will throw you under the bus to spare their own ego

Title: GSoC was a very good work experience
Review Description: It was a summer coding internshipjob for students Google pays you to work for an open source organization I worked for KDE Got to learn a lot It was fun

Title: Very Professional
Review Description: Working for Google you were on your own a lot You were given the opportunity to reach your peak potential the only way you could fail is if you did not want to succeed

Title: Excellent place to work
Review Description: Google is wonderful place to work it is like dream come true Best place to work Fun Facilities are awesome really really good place Food is good

Title: good foods
Review Description: Oh yeah Google is nicest place to work for Many things most people benefit because Google spent for good entertainment for their employee such as Gym pool bikes parks and good foods

Title: Team based work environment but also very competitive
Review Description: I enjoy working at Google as a research coordinator because we are in a teamoriented environment but also we know what each individual needs to do to be successful The work is different everyday and we get many new projects weekly I love the culture at google because it is very relaxed but people know when to work hard and when to have fun Google has taught me a lot of different skill sets that I can take with me into my new career The only thing that I would say thats negative is job security and employee benefits

Title: Best job ever
Review Description: I would still be working with Admeld if Google had not bought out the company Staff and management were fantastic Excellent workplace culture Excellent coworkers

Title: Enter all check payments into Google Document
Review Description: Overall job was wonderful Someday a little crazier than other but day always brought new challenges Wonderful supervision willing to teach me the ins and outs of servicing our clients

Title: nan
Review Description: The company was decent It was not too stressful reviewed scanned images of books on a daily Management and HR were great Wish the pay was a bit better

Title: Fun job but too much smoke and mirrors
Review Description: If you can turn a blind eye to all of the dishonesty around you and focus on your job you will be very happy Typical with large sales organizations they look away from those that lack integrity as long as they produce numbers It can be very cut throat but also the best training and learning experience you will get at any job Treat it as a privilege to learn and go allin and you will have a long and prosperous career Not the culture for an honest contrarian Long hours but excellent payout

Title: Best place to work
Review Description: Google is known for being the best place to work at and it truly lived up to that The clinical part of the company was always grown just like the company itself Work was always consistent and very enjoyable

Title: Google Work Experience
Review Description: I worked for Google Ad Words where the environment is very competitive which is fine with me all sales environments are competitive The job was going well until we found out we were going to a quarterly commission base pay from a monthly We were told that we were getting a raise to compensate for the change in pay but we were not given the raise I understand the reason behind the team not getting the raise As a unit we failed to meet certain goals so in turn our pay was cut short I love the job overall though working with clients to maximize account performance is fun and Ive learned a lot working for Google Ad Words

Title: Good place to work
Review Description: As a contractor you are not expected of much performance at the same time cant excel much for career advancement Contract agents will get you in with a lower pay in the brand name of Google Just need to be tactful on that
Con: Contractors separation from Googlers Could be bullied at times

Title: Work hard play hard
Review Description: I enjoyed working at Google and formed great friendships It was very fastpaced as I started there preIPO and left a few years after the IPO I understand it is a very different company but I learned a lot during my tenure there

Title: awesome place to work
Review Description: I am very happy and fortunate to have had the opportunity to have had work for this great and most wonderful business I had learned a lot Every coworker in which I had contact with was very nice respectful professional

Title: Great Company to Work Good worklife balance
Review Description: I worked in the Paid Search division which at the time was owned by DoubleClickPerformics A lot of attention is given to employees to support them in developing a strong career path

Title: All conditions are more than satisfied
Review Description: I will not lie if I say that Google has all conditions to work there starting from good food and going to comfortable and entertainment rooms and sports activities Everything is available for free The only thing you need to think on is your work

Title: Google is a great place to work and advance your career
Review Description: Working at Google is great and there are not a lot of issues working there However the one area at Google that could have been improved upon was the work life balance As I grew older working long hours was not what I wanted to do As I progressed through my career at Google I struggled to maintain a great worklife balance and found it difficult to disconnect from work due to the fact that I was working on many high pressure high visibility projects Other than that Google is a great place to work and it is what you make out of it

Title: Good Job but not so good working for Adecco
Review Description: Working for Google is wonderful but when you have a middle man such as Adecco it makes things very difficult in your work Google is a great company and this opportunity is one to always remember

Title: Good People to Work With
Review Description: I liked the culture the projects and the opportunity to work with stellar colleagues who taught me a lot about how to be a top rate professional Project deadlines could be challenging You have to be prepared to learn rapidly

Title: Fun working place
Review Description: Typical Day Working different tasks depending on demand Management Self Managed for the most Part Hardest Part Deciding on what to Eat Most Enjoyable part Playing Ping Pong on Break with Colleges

Title: Somehow Productive
Review Description: Working in Google is fun I have learned many things I gained many friends Gained confidence with my English Improved my typing skills and multitasking skill

Title: Fun workplace
Review Description: Working in the metro always poses more challenges considering the distance of the workplace and the compensation the company provides Another point to consider are the bills and expenses you have to cover each month

Title: Fun workplace and great coworkers
Review Description: Best Company Ever Great work environment and lot of scope for development Definitely the best company to work with Working here is lot of fun and the targets are doable They dont put a lot of pressure on the employees The team leads and all the senior staff are very friendly

Title: Productive and educational
Review Description: Typical day with Google starts at 830am and ends around 45pm depending on the job Really great company and really great coworkers Few things could be done differently but its currently being changed

Title: i am under graduate student
Review Description: I have a financial problems facing by me and my family just want a little job to run my family well and full fill their wishes Im still a student but I have little experience so if you need any type of employee just remember me Ill be there

Title: Good work and life balance company
Review Description: Great place to work amazing coworkers and job atmosphere easy going people free breakfast lunch and dinner only down fall about the job is that you have to go thru an temp agency not a temp to perm position

Title: Stressful environment poor management
Review Description: I worked at Google as a contractor for a year and a half After couple months on the job I have realized that a lot of things that have been advised prior to the start date appeared to be different in reality ie micromanagement different job tasks manager changed lack of leadership or lack of clear goals to follow On top of that I could feel that I was being left out on many occasions since I was a contractor Also I felt mistreated I could get a random text or a phone call late in the evening from a PM asking why I did this or why I did not do this even though everything has been discussed and followed per provided instructions At the end of my contract I felt miserable and underestimated I am glad that my project ended

Title: High Performance fastpaced fun workplace
Review Description: Great coworkers Supportive Management Flexible work environment Feels like home because of the good care Google takes of its employees Once a Googler always a Googler

Title: productive and fun
Review Description: productive and fun work place very social work place with lots of friendly vibes meeting lots of people learning and educating others being apart of google history

Title: Fast Paced and Fun Work Environment
Review Description: Working at major tech companies through contract positions is a very effective and efficient way to get a head start on ones professional career The management and team onsite is very communicative and looks to help you grow as both an individual and working professional Networking is a key aspect of positions such as this and a lot of what you get from the role is what you make of it My advice is to be outgoing communicative and always looking for ways to prove yourself I would definitely work here again if the opportunity arose

Title: It was a job
Review Description: I was on the Google Play contract with Xerox for two years The pay was less than stellar the benefits were below par and the work environment was a few card tables in a poorly ventilated room for the first few months I worked there Xerox lost the contract eventually so there is no real reason to utilize this review to judge any other Google contracts against my own experiences

Title: a big company
Review Description: One meets interesting people Sales organization is gradually maturing at Google Smart people with lots of differing interests Gradually more conscious of external environment

Title: Good place to work
Review Description: As a contractor you are not expected of much performance at the same time cant excel much for career advancement Contract agents will get you in with a lower pay in the brand name of Google Just need to be tactful on that
Con: Contractors separation from Googlers Could be bullied at times

Title: a fun and nice place to work
Review Description: I learned a lot at Google and also enjoyed working there It was a very competitive but enjoyable workplace Google took care of its employees very nicely with break out areas within 10 15 paces of our desks massage chairs cab services etc

Title: Productive fun place to work
Review Description: Get to see the world and eat for free Weekly pay was decent especially with overtime Going from one state to another was nice Having 65 dollars per day for per diem was more than enough to eat daily Paid five star hotels and new rental car vehicles Hotel and rental car reward points was great☺
Pro: Free food and travel Paid every week No supervision good company to work for
Con: Contract expired to soon at very short notice

Title: Fun but stressful
Review Description: Its a easy job You just go from place to place and make sure that Googles products are advertised right and that the employees know everything about the products they sale

Title: Travelling around the country
Review Description: Amazing offices around the world excellent restaurants and great equipment A lot of travelling involved but always with support to make it possible

Title: Good collaboration
Review Description: Id like to find out more on growing the CPC rate I love working with Google for the freedom kind of opportunity a publisher gets when working with you Thanks

Title: Really good
Review Description: Really good company to work for Lots of perks good salary

Title: Good
Review Description: Professional friendly environment free foodgymperkssnacks etc As a contractor not a lot of room for growth Its good for a family person 35yo and above For young person better to work in fastpaced competitive startup

Title: Challenging Team and Work
Review Description: New aspects and different ways to approach things trying to think differently and being a subject matter expect comeup with new ideas on a day to day basis

Title: Candid work place great environment
Review Description: Looker was a great place to work at the culture was friendly and everyone is candid I especially had a good time getting to know the higher management

Title: fun job cool perks
Review Description: work in google merchandising through a third party had lot of fun meeting people who loved their goggle products area mangers and google direct office was a great help when needed any help on projects

Title: Great benefits Nurturing environment for motivated individuals
Review Description: Overall Google is an amazing place to work Your daytoday can be vastly different depending on what team youre on and what your role is The one thing thats consistent for all teams is that innovators and those with a motivated work ethic will excel no matter where you are on the corporate ladder

Title: productive and fun place
Review Description: I learnt a lot on myself when I was on the field everyday is different Thanks to the training you learn a lot about different useful applications you interact with different people from different countries you travel a lot

Title: Fun place with a lot of technology to learn
Review Description: Workplace is good and a lot of things to learn from here in terms of technology A lot of interesting work and intent to connect all technology partners is the key
Job Title: DGM at Foray Soft and Consultant at Google

Title: Productive Fun Place to Work
Review Description: A typical day of work and checking the work load and request sent in the morning Complete the task that require immediate attention Occasionally an urgent request will appear There are daily up keep task that are done in the morning While the rest of the day is spent working on various projects Time management is largely necessary to stay on top of things The work environment is very friendly and relaxing Hardest part of the job and influx of work can appear at a moments notices I have learn new skills in SFDC and analytic insights

Title: Cool
Review Description: Cool job and team Great food and perks Cool gym and swimming pool Cool travel and buildings Not much space for creativity and advancement wishing for more
Job Title: Marketing Events Project Manager Google Partners

Title: Excellent Place
Review Description: I worked as an FTE for Google Best best place to work excellent environment best peers Excellent scope for the fresher to learn and grow Must work place in an IT Carrer

Title: Great
Review Description: Great place fun to work Very busy meeting deadlines Learn alot Progress through job role Interesting place large teams Good people good work ethics

Title: A Nice Place To Work
Review Description: Its a nice place to work The people are pleasant and positive The work is not overbearing but just enough to keep a person motivated on the daily basis

Title: Active Team member
Review Description: we were four members of IT team in our company and use to handle 140 Coffee Stores Every day was challenging for us because of new issues and Work pressure I being in IT Team has fixed has found a way to print Receipt for online ordering

Title: working at a job
Review Description: typical day at work is always busywitch is good by me because by me staying busy IT SEEMS TO make the time go by much fasterAND THE more i work The more i learn because each day is a learning exprience which makes the job more exciting The hardest part is when some people slack in their work assigment But thats when i have to work extra hard just to make sure that the job is done correct The fun part of the job is getting may pay check

Title: Good place to work
Review Description: As a contractor you are not expected of much performance at the same time cant excel much for career advancement Contract agents will get you in with a lower pay in the brand name of Google Just need to be tactful on that
Con: Contractors separation from Googlers Could be bullied at times

Title: I never worked at google
Review Description: I never worked at google never ever evr evr ever worked at google i dont kknpw why you think i worked at google but i never worked at google ever ever

Title: Name is enough
Review Description: Google dont need any introduction And the atmosphere where I work was awesome No other company till date I like much I like Google I was working for Google products like Google Pixel phones Chromebook play cards Chromecast

Title: what i learned
Review Description: It had been a great experience with the company It was my first job and i have learnt a lot from it It taught me how to be professional and I learnt about work culture

Title: Google via Randstad
Review Description: This was a very fun place to work they did lots of activities to keep people fresh and engaged I really enjoyed it unfortunately my position was a contract with an end date So unless you could figure out something else to do that was needed to further the project then you were done

Title: Access to Google perks is nice job is terrible
Review Description: Made to believe that music experience would be relevant but whenever it came up was shut down in favor of following the guidelines Was made to believe that there would be health benefits NOPE The prices are identical to the marketplace The amount of research is minimal Most of the research has to go through designated sources so the majority of this job is data entry The only reason Im keeping this job right now is as supplemental income If youre looking for a real job look elsewhere

Title: fun
Review Description: Google was amazing to work for Fun times Great people Facilities were amazing Long hours but the perks made up for it Loved every minute of the experience

Title: Excellent place to work
Review Description: You will work hard You will work together You will have fun You will learn new things You will get stressed out In my experience everyone is treated as a responsible adult The culture is fantastic and collaborative The only gripe I have is that often there are high level direction changes that require you to refocus on a new area without notice and the can be a problem when in an external facing role as you will have to redirect partners who are not privy to that direction change

Title: Great job but no room for advancement
Review Description: Great job meet tons of people Travel is great Visible job You will encounter tons of people wanting to talk about your job daily Software experience needed

Title: Na
Review Description: Its a greta place to work The work culture is nice relaxing and fun You will enjoy your projects if you stay up to speed on relevant skills needed

Title: Productive workplace and Collaborative culture
Review Description: Very cost driven which is typical at any company Great place to learn how to work with international crossfunctional teams Always leverage data to align stakeholders

Title: A place for opinionated people
Review Description: Fun place to work Lots of perks Smart people But lack of direction focus and discipline The hiring process brings in or used to hire some smart but opinionated primadonnas that can overwhelm meetings and discussions

Title: Best Company
Review Description: CognizantGoogle is the best company that I have worked for The office ambiance was superb Very generous when it comes to awards and giveaways Free lunch was awesome

Title: Google creates an environment for creativity to thrive
Review Description: Google creates an environment for creativity to thrive The difference being the people they hire Each team member is an expert at their field and its through these people that relationships are built

Title: Excellent working environment and work culture
Review Description: Very relaxed yet competitive work culture Learned to work in diverse environment improved management and technical skills Never thought working would be fun before working in Google

Title: Works are good and going on well
Review Description: Sometimes work will be hard but should be doing as my duty How to handle customers and solving problems i learned in these yrs Good friendly atmosphere

Title: Here interesting and instructive
Review Description: This company is very standers Rule regulation better than other company I learnt lot of things from this company they did train us for fourteen days No hardest part for the company but need to be careful Its really enjoyable place to work

Title: Best
Review Description: best everrrr Days were Hectic but i felt occipied it was as any other GA work but was worth it and would love to work in a space like pace where i can be the person i am and can do what im best at

Title: amazing place to work
Review Description: My longest time was spent at this company I learned people skills along with work awesome place to work for any starterI got promoted to higher levels at very early stagesthey trust the employees

Title: Beautiful grounds
Review Description: Its nice to go to work where you see squirrels and birds in the tree and get free food The culture is young but innovative with many smart people It was a comfortably challenging job

Title: exploring New technologies
Review Description: I love to learn new technologies with self learning capabilitiesWorplace will be moderate enough work management skills will be improvedPlaying team member is fine

Title: Good place to work
Review Description: As a contractor you are not expected of much performance at the same time cant excel much for career advancement Contract agents will get you in with a lower pay in the brand name of Google Just need to be tactful on that
Con: Contractors separation from Googlers Could be bullied at times

Title: Great experience
Review Description: Worked there on a contract basis enjoyed the way they handled the paperwork the paycheck came on time support was just a call or email away I could work from home and take care of my family

Title: great if you like the product
Review Description: not my cup of tea im oly writting the review because i cant continue without doing so a job is a job and a career is a career do what makes you happy

Title: AdeccoGoogle
Review Description: Fun and enjoyable atmosphere No complaints at all on my part I was a contract position so my expectations were not high but I was surprised by the warm welcome

Title: Good place to start
Review Description: not bad could be better Learned a lot and would reccomend starting here to get a foot in the door and learn valuable skills But would want the company to be more open about why they provide compensation and actual work

Title: Amazing work environment
Review Description: This job was very rewarding because i was given the opportunity to help low income minority students brushen up their skills before they went on to the next grade

Title: Advertiser
Review Description: I worked from home on my computer uploading videos to be monetized on YouTube and generate a revenue per click on every ad The RPM needs to stay on a higher rate in order to increase the revenue Sharing videos on social media increases the audience which allows people to click on the ads shown on videos

Title: ITF in Granville County Schools
Review Description: This job has very poor working conditions unrealistic expectations very poor salary and benefits lack of advancement poor managers and I could not recommend it to anyone

Title: Great
Review Description: Great place to work Free food Fascinating work Pay is really great people nice Would recommend working there any time I would go back again if I wasnt on a contract that expired

Title: great team and good managers
Review Description: I was a contractor so my experience was different than employees but it was a great gig for me Team was supportive manager was great and the perks awesome the food alone was enough to make me love working there I learned a lot contributed to the team in big ways and worked with amazing people

Title: A very political place to work
Review Description: It may sound good working for Google but it is not Working for Google is more of who you know than what you know A very political place of employment

Title: Very productive and fun work environment
Review Description: From the first day of training the experience of being there is very euphoric The training was very fun and interactive with the other trainees and trainer The first day of work was just how the trainer told us it would be very fast pace interactive with other co workers from Google and laid back as well Every day was the same but different either pick customer order pay for it with with Google credit card or pack the orders after theyve been paid for I learned how to keep that process moving fast and steady to where the customers get their orders fast and in one piece It helped a lot that that the leads supervisors and management from the main office were very kind and always willing to help The hardest part for me was the commute to work I lived in Oakland and the job was in Hayward which was three cities away All the together the job was fun nd the people were some of the best of the co workers Ive ever had

Title: Cutthroat
Review Description: This was a boiler room of sales reps that were petty and used scripted pitcheds to sell services to the public that were shady at best I have to type in something to fill the balnk space so this is all i want to say

Title: Great Experience
Review Description: Great Job that i gained great experience but unforonately it was a contract job so my time there ended Overall The company treated me equal and i had a great working experience

Title: A wonderful work enviroment with fun employees
Review Description: Coming to work for a company that really wants you to have fun and excel while working was a dream for me They really taught me about work ethics and enjoying your job while earning a decent pay check

Title: The Environment which I got was Ideal The workstation was simply amazing and the leaders who guided me towards the process understood me well
Review Description: Reviewing from day 1 I learned a lot in this 4 month tenure Being A fresher This job will always be a cherish able experience since I got to know deep down What my capabilities are The hardest part of the job being the targets set by Google which were to be achieved on regular basis The most enjoyable part were the sessions conducted by google to get a better insight of what Google Ad word and YouTube channel marketing is

Title: Interesting place to work
Review Description: Travel all over Europe the work environment is formidable Exciting company Relaxed work environment You get many perks working here Free meals gym snacks coffee and etc

Title: Amazing opportunity
Review Description: It was always fun to work there Smiling faces around helpful coworkers make your life better I loved the culture and learned many new things there

Title: Very fast paced
Review Description: You need to be on your toes and sharp to work there Theres a lot of smart and competitive people lots of great lifestyle perks but expect the hours to be typically longer than most companies

Title: Productive and Friendly Enviroment
Review Description: typical day would be coming in and having a chat with a few colleagues Then going to our desk and sign to see what our assignments I learned to work faster but yet accurate The workplace is magnificent and really comfortable and has many people from different backgrounds Hardest part is to remember all Policies for the first few months but it gets better gradually Most enjoyable is playing and walking around the business area as it has beautiful lakes and people play sports on the grass patches

Title: Good place to work
Review Description: Great work enviorenmet People were really helpful and friendly The CEO was very supporting Management was pretty good It was an awesome place to work

Title: Good place to work
Review Description: As a contractor you are not expected of much performance at the same time cant excel much for career advancement Contract agents will get you in with a lower pay in the brand name of Google Just need to be tactful on that
Con: Contractors separation from Googlers Could be bullied at times

Title: Not a great place to work
Review Description: The Evolution is going back words supporting a premium google product Accenture is getting back to the terms of chat from email and soon I can see days where they are going to make it as a call center

Title: productive and fun work place
Review Description: Pushed to work well but encouragingly Friendly work place good management nice hours Neat social events would recommend as a place of work Good progression

Title: Exemplory large tech company
Review Description: Google isnt perfect but it almost certainly comes the closest of any company with dozens of thousands of employees A typical day as an Eng Mgr is filled with meetings most of which are actually productive and interesting The balance is usually spent reading and responding to email or looking through artifacts created by the team you manage Ive learned how to organize and empower people to be productive and happy engineers Upper management can often be ignorant of how things are in the trenches but there are excellent tools for bubbling up widespread discontent so it does generally get addressed The hardest part of the job tends to be staying abreast of all the change happening across such a gigantic organization since you never know when something will impact you The most enjoyable part of the job is talking to the great coworkers especially over daily free lunch

Title: Great
Review Description: I am a fresher want to experience the world a more and more thr is so much to be found i look foward to work with joy and wisdom i hope my mistakes will be neglected

Title: Collecting GPS data to support Google Maps
Review Description: Exciting company Relaxed work environment with very little stress Plenty of travel Google really does take care of you and provides you with everything needed to do a good job

Title: poor work environment
Review Description: good company a little unorganized compensation fair work environment poor short breaks no relievers no job security at all poor benefits no growth with no comp

Title: Google Kirkland
Review Description: I liked to start work early This was not a problem with my managers I was a tester for Android Hangouts We had sufficient equipment to do our jobs and very good supervision Googles tools are easy to learn and use for the most part and issues seem to get fixed in a reasonable amount of time I enjoyed working with our leads and Manager They worked extremely hard getting us up to speed on changing features Googles facilities are first rate I would be very happy to go back on another Vendor job if the opportunity arises

Title: Vendor working at Google is not fun
Review Description: This review does not accurately represent Google since I am a vendor I work under AccentureVACO As a vendor you are not a real Googler and you are treated like an afterthought and the real Googlers are embarrassed by you

Title: Na
Review Description: It is a place that I call heaven on earth and the working experience is literally awesome which I cannot explain in my words Please if anyone gets an option to work with such company please dont let go off By the way my experience is this if you people like it take is positive if not never mind
Job Title: senior reviewer Risk Analyst Risk Operations

Title: Perfect Working Place to Interact with Decent People
Review Description: Google in New York was a decent working place with full of creative and skillful people My manager always supported me during the difficult projects It was great to had a lot of experience in marketing and SEO fields

Title: Dead end company
Review Description: Awful management in many departments ranging from simple incompetence to toxic management They lost the culture that made them special soon after going public Now they are a lifeless company struggling to stay relevant and dreaming of being like their tech giant competitors When I started the company was about free and expensive goodies lavish parties and wildly varying compensation By the time I left almost all of the major perks had gone Not that perks are a reason to work somewhere but in the course of a year they went from overspending on everything to getting increasingly stingy Only work here if you are just starting out There are much better options in larger established companies or younger startups

Title: Awesome work envrionment
Review Description: Work environment is awesome You get many perks working here Free meals gym snacks coffee and etc Although depending on what program you are in it can be hard to move up

Title: Operations Technician
Review Description: I was a Contractor at X for about a year You almost get all the benefits as a full time employee but not the normal status of a FTE You will be looked down upon due to this reason

Title: Great culture
Review Description: I enjoy working at Google its a very team oriented company where you feel that you are all working for the same goal Everyone I have worked with has been exceptional

Title: It was Accenture and not Google
Review Description: It was fun working at the client site Google never had any issues It was never a boring day at work always exciting something new to learn everyday lot of challenges

Title: Google
Review Description: Great place to work at lots of benefits free food gym massage etc Employee feel so relaxing to work at Google which is way too good for employee

Title: Good place to work
Review Description: Good atmosphere where work can be completely balanced Excellent place to work with good infrastructure Great place to learn many things Work life can be easily balanced while working with Google

Title: productive and fun place to learn
Review Description: it was a very productive experience for me i got to interact with a lot of customers and employees on a very professional level i learned a lot while using electronic devices as well to help assist us in our daily tasks

Title: really a fantasy Job
Review Description: working for them was really nice and easy very peaceful and friendly Wish there were many more places like this one As long as you do what your suppose to do as any other place your good especially at Google

Title: Incredibly smart talented and amazing people
Review Description: Being a contractor at Google has its downside for sure Management views you as disposable youre not afforded the obvious benefits of full time employees and you cant remain at the company for longer than 2 years Google is a fast moving machine and I was afforded the opportunity to work on a huge variety of projects with a LOT of autonomy

Title: Good place to work
Review Description: As a contractor you are not expected of much performance at the same time cant excel much for career advancement Contract agents will get you in with a lower pay in the brand name of Google Just need to be tactful on that
Con: Contractors separation from Googlers Could be bullied at times

Title: Agency Business Development
Review Description: Typical day of work admin emails client service team meeting cross functional team work best practice sharing travel to client meetings quarterly planning Excellent work culture Good management team Excellent perks and benefits Good cross functional collaboration

Title: Great company lackluster execution
Review Description: The culture in the company is phenomenal However because all of the work done is remote it can be very difficult to identify with the aforementioned culture and remember your why Compensation is more than fair and the job is flexible

Title: A great workplace where you can learn skills balance your life and meet brilliant people
Review Description: Working at Google is a dream of many people Indeed it provides you with the best working environment learning system and support from everywhere When you work in Google you will find out how less you know because the colleagues either have high degrees or strong working background But they are all willing to help Even during the lunch time people love to discuss their work not regard work as a task or stress In addition you can enjoy the free beverage snacks meal fruits gym massage entertainment facilities nursing room even tents and sofa for a nap Besides Google always has activities like Tshirt design competitionbike to work day to enrich your working life free training program like CPR certificate and so on Google has everything you may or may not lol need the company only wants googlers to focus on their work

Title: Stressful
Review Description: Great perks and benefits Terrible people management I never felt comfortable at Google Everything you do is logged and closely monitored leaving the management team with the ability to use any negative performance metric against you for your performance review Google certainly plays favorites

Title: Great company
Review Description: A great company to be at and work for Extremely caring and driven environment where everybody is working hard to have a positive impact on the world

Title: Productive Workplace Often Stressful
Review Description: Management is incredibly flexible with work hours and startingleaving time Working from home happens often Parking and commute can be a pain due to congested roads Workplace is open environment so it can get loud Lots of interesting challenging problems youre likely to never see anywhere else Security has the benefit of having the support of upper management tiers making it less cumbersome to get your work done Friendly working environment albeit the job itself can be very very stressful if youre bad about worklife balance

Title: its probably a great place to work if you are not a contractor
Review Description: Probably great place to work if you are not a contractor As a contractor your access is very restricted Management style is ok not mircor management Communication is relaxed

Title: Really takes care of their people
Review Description: Had a really good time at Google One of the biggest perk for working here is there are always fun problems to solve The amenities are great and the food awesome

Title: As a full time employee it would have been great as a contractor it wasnt good
Review Description: Full time employees and contractors are two different kinds of people and are treated as such here It made working here really stressful difficult and caused a lot of tension amongst our team

Title: Workplace nd job
Review Description: Good to work with such a big company Good support from the leads to complete the given task Friendly Environment Reaching the targets Overall it is a good experience

Title: Productive and fun at workplace
Review Description: I liked working here because it was so much fun never felt like work it never felt like we were working because it was so much fun Weekends were off so best

Title: I like Google
Review Description: Before we buy a new gadget or try a new restaurant most of us look at the reviews at Amazon or Yelp or whichever online retailer or site were browsing just to make sure were not wasting our hard earned money on something uselessSome are useless and angry and others are so glowing that cant be real The best ones walk between and regardless of the experience the reviewer had they offer up the kind of information thats invaluable when making a decision Heres how you can write those kinds of reviews

Title: Amazing work place
Review Description: Been with Google for over a year and really enjoyed working with amazing people that makes every day an enjoyable experience Opportunity to really own your work and collaborate with other teams across the world

Title: Job overview
Review Description: Google was an awesome job I worked independent based on my assignment for the week Management was available if needed Traveled to various cities

Title: Great place to work and coworkers were very friendly and helpful
Review Description: My sixmonth stint at this location was workplace HeavenFree lunch gourmet or alacarte employee lounges with games scooter for travel in the massive office space The number of interviews just to consult were five or six in number for employees something like nine to eleven interviews

Title: Google Maps
Review Description: Poorly ran both from Google and Adecco Treated horribly by higher level Google management The simple but unfortunate reality is youre a number Thats it Period

Review Description: There are really great perks and you feel like you are part of a large company but I found that the fulltime employees treat you differently Like you are less It makes it hard to feel like you are valued

Title: Its a big company
Review Description: Google is all about the bottom line and you feel it in the culture It is a highpressure company with a high expectation of results They provide a lot but they expect a lot

Title: Stressfull
Review Description: It was a temp job I was always worried to lose my job the same day I had to work I wouldnt tecommendand stayed focus for 10 hours straight if I wanted to keep my job

Title: Not great for TVCs
Review Description: Although working at Google might be great as a TVC you arent a true employee and you truly feel it Although I was promised a chance at conversion it became painfully clear that there is less than 1 of a chance to convert in TVC roles

Title: very competive work place day consist of work machines
Review Description: day should start with a good attitude ready to work and keep and a fast pace to hit a qoata and control scanning for a focused clean picture for online customers

Title: good times
Review Description: It was an experience and i learned a lot about leadership and creating a positive work environment I got to manage 3040 for the southeast region and travel all over and work for one of the biggest companies in the world I loved it And will miss it

Title: Great culture
Review Description: Supportive culture and nice people Makes it fun to work there Impactful projects Good food Depending on how high up your position is affects your work life balance

Title: Productive and Steady Work environment
Review Description: Coordinate events that took place in building Managed fluid work environment for software engineers Free Food Hardest part about the job was staying busy because sometimes there really was nothing to do I have never been comfortable with sitting around doing nothing Management was great

Title: Productive and Fun Work Place
Review Description: Working Within Google taught me most of my IT skills and all my general knowledge when it comes to businesses and advertisement I also learnt about accounts and credit control etc

Title: Stressful with lack of structure
Review Description: Bad structure and poor management Nothing ever makes any sense They have lied about its compensation in the beginning and snese then the pay structure still doenst add up

Title: Very beneficial with potential for training and future learning
Review Description: Excellent company to work with and very strong communication from management down the goals are set and very clearly communicated which puts everyone on the same wave length There is always the potential to undertake training to grow yourself and offer more to the business

Title: Great to work
Review Description: Really good place to work and expand endless opportunity while you work Always great to know that you can expand and have lots of different things to do

Title: good work place
Review Description: good to work and great work life balance and great to be with google and its amazing job to work at management is good and i would recommend every one to work at this place

Title: Not a great place for parents with kids
Review Description: Even though they mentioned in the interview that they were a family oriented company it was not true The perks are really only for the single Engineers The carpool buses hour do not accommodate parents who have to pick kids up from school

Title: fun place and the best people
Review Description: Google appeals to all of the different types of learners and teammates People are generally very accepting of different ideas and the innovative nature of the tech world drives us forward

Title: If your political views arent in agreement youll be treated badly
Review Description: If your political views arent in agreement with management youll be treated badly They will not let up until you leave Its all about politics

Title: Great place to work with a nice array of growth opportunities
Review Description: Google is a fast paced company with many new projects programs and challenges popping up everyday It can be difficult to keep up with the all of the changes and worklife balance is always an issue Management is flexible and accommodating which makes dealing with the sheer volume of issues a bit easier

Title: Fun and productive job
Review Description: Learnt a lot worked a lot harder than I imagined and it was fulfilling The coworkers are who make your life so much easier The technical expertise is tremendous

Title: Exciting and oneofakind work environment
Review Description: As a store operator I drove my own car to a large chain store that Google was partnered with and stayed in a back stock room with the rest of the team We would get specialized smartphones that received incoming shopping orders that we would then purchase from the store with a Google credit card neatly package and place them in a convenient location at the store and wait for the courier drivers to pick up the packages Some days were busy all day some days only had one or two orders The people who worked alongside me were great people Very friendly and fun to work with The manager took her job a little too seriously and didnt interact with the rest of us unless it was to give orders or tell us we did something wrong The hardest part of the job was finding some of the items as stores like Target or ToysRUs have huge amounts of products The most enjoyable part of the job was having fun with your coworkers and making work into something of a game or competition that would give us motivation increase our productivity and keep our spirits up

Title: Productive and Organized
Review Description: Worked on quality control of scanned documents using a computer programs through google Not much supervision quick turnover requested didnt listen to employees supervisor listened to music all day and didnt assist colleagues

Title: Fast pace and challenging Always keeping up with the changes
Review Description: Loved my position However the project wasnt forever Great place to work with great people Super fast paced work day So many cool projects to be apart of

Title: Productive and Inviting place to work
Review Description: There really is Not a Typical Day Its always changing and it keeps you on your toes Very exciting and collaborative I learned that the Google culture is very inviting and collaborative which was a huge change from my previous places of employment My Peers actually invited my ideas and respected my knowledge My Managers were top notch I could not ask for better The Culture at at Google is Great Lots of diversity a very lean dress code and you can bring your dog to work with you if you wish Bow Wow The hardest part of my job was leaving after being such an integral person of the development of the Operations Dept of the Carolinas The most enjoyable part of my job was seeing success The contracts taking hold and being executed The Network being built accepted and customers signing up To be point blank Watching Growth that I had been personally responsible for To be a part of a start up in the already saturated Telco and ISP industry making waves with the incumbents and making history at the same time This is definitely a part of telecom history that will never be forgotten and I am very proud to have been a part of that
Job Title: Network Deployment and Operations Field Manager

Title: Very enjoyable and fulfilling work

Title: Choose management that are creative yet responsible So many of my managers were fun and creative yet immature Either that or they were too strict
Review Description: Choose management that are creative yet responsible So many of my managers were fun and creative yet immature Either that or they were too strict bossy with little creativity and it makes a huge difference for the sales associates

Title: Great place to start
Review Description: Great place to start out They train you for everything you need to know Good free food everyday Nice break rooms with lots to do and a one year contact that can turn into a second year one as long as your a good employee

Title: Retaliate against smart employees that have a voice
Review Description: Company is full of know it alls that know nothing Like working in a high school cliche situation If you are friends then you advance If you have a brain you are shamed

Title: great brains but lacking in expertise
Review Description: As a consultant it is a very Strange culture Often overwhelming feeling of being on the outside looking in and treatment of contractors is very different than other companies They try very hard to keep them separate from the employee culture putting them in their own areas or not integrating them with employees etc Google has a pool of great brains graduated from best universities However their lacking in expertise in the field they are employed leaves them miles behind other tech companies in finding a solution or curing the bleeding so back office operations are very primitive and use of BPOs high Still very manual considering they are a tech giant Company needs more diversity in seasoned and experienced employees People are reclusive here like there is no other world outside of the company and entitlement is prevalent Benefits culture is good with free food and activities however teams still lack cohesion the kind that other companies have mastered It seems all the perks wont build a great team unless you have a good manager that has people skills Which is something that is lacking here Overall they have good pay and good work life balance since no one really is burning the midnight oil here

Title: productive and fun
Review Description: Great place to work on a lot of new technologies challenging projects in a dynamic environment work with talented friendly coworkers and plenty of fun events and activities

Title: Flexible but unsecure

Title: • Familiarity with lab equipment
Review Description: • Follow established reliability test procedures and perform various environmental and mechanical reliability testing photography of failures for documentation and report generation • Set up and run test equipment Environmental Chambers UV Chamber Thermal Cycling Chamber • Perform Chemical test Drop test with high speed camera tumble test II Heina’s RCA Abrasion test Auto force test Force gauge test Nidec Shimpo FGV200xy Cross hatch test Engagement cycle test • Record analyze and report test results using spreadsheets and charts • Updateupload the firmware • Build fixtures to set up the units for final testing • Maintain and operate the 3D printer • Perform soldering of small component 0402 or smaller under microscope

Title: Great place to have a family

Title: There lots of nice perks but not great if youre a contractor
Review Description: Let me start by saying Google has been good to me even though I am a contractor Ive met many wonderful people and you certainly cant argue with the perks If I were a fullitme employee Im almost certain Id be writing a stellar review but as a contractor espite all the wonderful benefits and exciting work environment it is simply hard to shake the feeling of being undervalued It varries from team to team but unless your team has a high budget and less need which is never the case your wage is going to be just enough to live off of The freedom to stay late and work overtime is sometimes given and ultimately that is what one must do to even have a shot at a full time role I have seen several good friends simply leave however once they were able to get the Google name on their resume and it is hard not to notice that ones talents are in demand and more valued elsewhere I hope that the internal machinery of the company will catch up to the problem of top talen leaving the company but I recognize there are resource constraints Overall I have enjoyed working at Google and there is certainly nothing Id rate as negative in terms of company culture

Title: terrible management

Title: Passionate developers blocked by poor management
Review Description: Working at Fitbit for 3 years Ive seen some smart talented peers The majority of nonmanagers were passionate about health fitness and making customers happy Good 1 Really passionate employees below manager level 2 Can wear workout clothes 3 Good location Embarcadero Needs Improvement The issue comes with very poor management especially when it comes to making big decisions Common things 1 Shipping products that arent done 2 Say youll patch old issues in order to ship a product and then never address it because the previous owner of the productfeature has already moved on to the next thing that needs to be rushed out the door 3 Compensation is well below average for the area though benefits are pretty good 4 Overall shortterm gain is prioritized with managers and above and this hurts products in the long term 5 Career advancement is nonexistent It is an afterthought to allow employees to grow into new or more advanced roles rather its all about shoving a new poorly decided productfeature 6 Employees opinions on the product arent taken seriously even though PLENTY of data from departments specifically made to gather that information Customer Support for customers Beta testing for internal employees 7 Talented employees looking to go into different departments but unable to due to culture of I only want to ship my product I dont have time to help others Shortsighted because it helps those teams to have newcomers that already know the ecosystem 8 HR is poorly structured and is consistently

Title: Wonderful direct supervisor terrible upper management
Review Description: Typical day at work Come in log into system get right to work gathering products to fulfill customer orders Help coworkers with hardtofind items or missingdamaged items What I learned Work as hard as I can always be ready to assist the team keep open communication with management Dont let any of them abuse their position to make your job harder than it should be Management The two direct supervisors I worked closest with during my time at Google Express were both very easygoing and handsoff As long as I got my work done and kept an open line of communication to assist with any complications that might come up they just left me to my work Now the other managers and district managers were an entirely different story They were entirely unwilling to help with anythingwhether it be scheduling points on our records or just being generally civil they consistently talked down to and looked down on us They would ask for our input on streamlining parts of the work process and proceed not to listen to any of our ideas until parts of the work programs malfunctioned or our order queue skyrocketed for weeks at a time Workplace culture Aside from the aforementioned management problems coworkers were for the most part easy to get along with and reliable to work with However as is the case in most work environments there were a handful of extremely lazy people This would not be a problem if it werent for the fact that the team as a whole works towards fulfilling a total quota for the day Laziness or carelessness in certain parts of the

Title: Fun Place to work
Review Description: Worked on contract from Service Source Google was great to Partner with Free lunches flexible work life balance great culture Would highly recomment

Title: Its a great place to work for
Review Description: This is an ideal place to work If I wouldnt have gone back to Vietnam for family reasons I would love to stay here to work My typical day is to review the content of the ads appeared in the websites which contain owner ads to see if there are any violations to our TC and will rate the content accordingly I have to maintain 95100 of accuracy Failing to do so we have to redo again and again till the quality meets In terms of culture I would say its vibrant and active However everyone seemed to be too focus into works that they tend to forget whats going on with other colleagues The most enjoyable part is needless to say food and facilities of the world class employers

Title: I miss working here
Review Description: I was a TVC Temp for 2 years which is the max I was amazed at what benefits I got for not being an employee The culture is unmatched by any company I have worked for My team hours were crazy 7am5pm but wasnt an employee If you become an employee you are set for life which was my goal I couldnt attend company events get extra perks and I constantly went above and beyond to prove to my boss and team I could be hired as an employee which never happened in the end I was promised 4x in 2 years I would be converted Everyday Im trying so hard to be a Googler again

Title: Super easy and relaxed atmosphere

Title: Best experience in my career
Review Description: I found working at Google to be very challenging and rewarding It wasnt perfect but the pros outweighed the cons I appreciated working with a stellar group of people from wideranging backgrounds Googles dedication to users and scientific principles helped changed the way I do my job significantly If you are ambitious I highly recommend it I found it both hard and fun

Title: Great Place to Work
Review Description: I have no complaints about Google It lives up to the hype The benefits are like no other Ive had at any other company Free Food great healthcare awesome environment etc

Title: Great Benefits
Review Description: Google by far has the best benefits if you are a perm employee They hire a lot a contractors to do the grunt work and hire college grads to manage people who has no experience doing it This makes it very uncomfortable for everyone Professionalism is lacking by the college grades which is expected since they are managing people when they had no prior work experience doing it They give you a lot of perks but it comes with a price But overall the benefits are great so I cant complain to much

Title: Contractor perspective
Review Description: Drove from SF to Mountain View 15 hours each way to avoid travel sickness on the shuttle which costs 150 for contractors Lots of free food everywhere and lots of nice places to hang out outdoors or in a cafe or in a nook Generally quiet atmosphere indoors Everyone looks happy Very casual and diverse

Title: Good benefits ok experience

Title: Friendly environment to work
Review Description: Very friendly and comfortable environment to work Work life balance personal improvements and growth Pleasure to work in this company Management is very good

Title: productive and competitive work place

Title: Great work culture
Review Description: My experience working at Google amplified work possibilities for me because of the very horizontal work culture I worked as a journalist prior to joining the company and newsrooms can be more of a vertical working structure in order to meat constant daily at least deadlines I grew and learned a completely different way of management working at Google One that I found much more pleasurable and effective The hardest part of the job was a constant selfpressure to exceed The most enjoyable part of the job was the continuous learning truly transforming
Job Title: Manager Rich Media Ad Platforms Operations

Title: Excellent

Title: Fantastic place to work
Review Description: I worked at Google as a contract employee for 18 months The work environment is fantastic the benefits free food and drink are unbelievable you get to work with some of the smartest people on the planet

Title: nan
Review Description: its a blessing to wake up and enjoy working for Google benefits are amazing and the Google culture is wonderful you feel at home working and its also like a second home with all the different things you can do

Title: Google
Review Description: google is amazing when it comes to employee benefits work hard and also do not miss out on the fun free lunches given were a cherry on the top

Title: Unfortunate Leadership Failings
Review Description: There are so many smart passionate people in this company who desperately want to deliver great products and lifechanging experiences for customers Sadly many of those dreams are dashed by executives who are out of touch with current development cycles and brag about wanting their cake and eating it too Teams are overworked and have to sacrifice quality in order to meet aggressive and arbitrary deadlines set not by engineering but by marketing If the company could get out of that cycle and back to its roots it would be a fantastic place to work again

Title: team of contract workers
Review Description: When taking a contract position you are hired as a second class citizen and will be treated as such This is a way for Google to avoid headcount issues and still get people to do the work Contract workers work more than the FTE employees without the benefits The Google performance reviews are a popularity contest

Title: productive and fun work place
Review Description: i learned how to create a indipendant strong in mailroom office as a officer under the pressure i do beyone the call of duty by seeking out and following up on additional responsibilities and contribute frequently to department meetings is not any harders part on work all are easy to understand and i like the management team about the management system workpalce enviroment are very productive

Title: Great Company Culture
Review Description: Great company culture but change in company strategy causing loss in talent Located in San Francisco Encouraging the employees to live a healthy fit life

Title: Working with Google
Review Description: Working with Google on site is a great experience usually the day is packed with work still we find sometime to give hearty laugh and fun But the exceptional environment in the company allow us to work with a free hand as we have a keen approach on getting the work done and we are allowed to use as many possible approaches as we can The most challenging part of the job is meet the client expectation as we are working with worlds biggest client we have to make sure the datareports shared with them is perfect in terms for quality presentation and data integrity Along with all the constraints the most exciting part of working is Google Adwords and the never ending fun of exploring it

Title: Googly
Review Description: Yes the culture at Google is googley Great place to work and in todays environment its the ideal place to work There is nothing to rant about expect that hopefully Google will keep growing so that others may have an opportunity to work here

Title: great place to work
Review Description: the management is great the culture is awesome and the people are young and motivated who also share their best practices only con is the Ive talked to others who sell adwords for a living and they make much more

Title: Dependent on management
Review Description: Great benefits great pay incredibly smart coworkers but lacking in direction Many similar products overlapping no clear focus Great opportunities for movement andor advancement

Title: Great culture terrible HR policies
Review Description: The company attracts top talent and truly the possibilities are endless The highering process is a nightmare and costs them talent Employees review each other which is great until you have no one to review you bc tempscontract workers arent allowed to participate in the reviews and yet over half the workforce seems to be a temp or contract worker When going through the hiring process you may be asked to interview up to five times with 5 different interviewers or not at all Its inconsistent You must be approved by a hiring committee most of whom youve never met and who may not fully understand your job role

Title: not a place to work
Review Description: They will hired more than 100 employees during holidays for permanent positions but after the holidays they will only give you 8 hours a week not worth it

Title: Bad place to work
Review Description: The people who worked with me were all amazing the only thing is that there was no real job security and no benefits They keep changing their processes so as soon as you get used to something they seem to change it for the sake of change

Title: Good place to work
Review Description: As a contractor you are not expected of much performance at the same time cant excel much for career advancement Contract agents will get you in with a lower pay in the brand name of Google Just need to be tactful on that
Con: Contractors separation from Googlers Could be bullied at times

Title: Best place Ive ever worked
Review Description: there really isnt anything bad i can say about working here I loved every minute The only bad part is the promotion process Its not very good or does it go off the best qualified and hardest working

Title: Great place to work
Review Description: Very fast moving environment where you are surrounded by fabulous smart people Great location to work free lunches loads of activities to try and lots of perks
Con: contract so no room for advancement

Title: Productive
Review Description: Google shopping express was an interesting more independent job then I assumed I was hired through temp agency but had most access to Google home campus and was welcomed like any other I had to drive to different various locations throughout a couple cities around me but at the time the pay was very well worth it

Title: Fun place to work but nothing to learn much
Review Description: It is a fun place to work Free meals and cab benefits are included Less work pressure and cool atmosphere No political pressure But salary hike is less and no growth in career

Title: A fun place to work in one of the most amazing companies in the world
Review Description: A great place to work in one of the most innovative companies in the world All 5 starts to work place and culture working with very talented people from all over the globe
Job Title: Director Global Deal Operations Google Cloud

Title: Great benefits along with engineering driven culture

Title: Super Super Super Place To Work
Review Description: Everything you have seen and read is true Its an amazing place In India the support functions are stuck in a formal workplace mindset HR cannot leave work early Politics is prevalent in every organisation in some form Google is no different When so many intelligent people come together you can imagine the competition

Title: Productive and fun workplace with ping pong table
Review Description: Productive and fun workplace with ping pong table Typical day includes coding and literature learningreading good management special culture learning coding

Title: Production and quality

Title: Great fun place

Title: Google MapsExtensive Travel
Review Description: Confidential and several NDAs signed It was an excellent opportunity and I learned an incredible amount of information in the mapping and engineering department I look forward to learning more in my next opportunity

Title: productive and fun with students

Title: Great place to work

Title: I had a great time
Review Description: I worked on the Google Express project during its initial inception in the East Coast cities such as DC Boston NY and Chicago While on the project I was stationed in the brand new Google office in Pittsburgh I loved it The culture is fun the company is flexible and cool Most importantly the people are smart and a joy to work with

Title: Productive and Fun Place to work
Review Description: I love working for google The environment and atmosphere is completely noncomparison to any place that I have worked at before If you ever get that chance to work for this company do it

Title: Its a place to grow

Title: Participation to Bold programme
Review Description: I encourage any student to participate to the Bold immersion programme It is a great programme to challenge yourself and to meet people from different countries It was short but very intense I keep this experience as one of the best of my life

Title: Great place to grow your skills and make connections in the industry

Title: Management
Review Description: Google is an outstanding place to grow in your career I was lucky enough to have the opportunity to work on the Ugrad team as well as Google Brain Management is very hands off but helpful allowing recruiters to learn quickly without feeling micromanaged If it were not for my contract ending I would forever stay with this team

Title: Good Company
Review Description: Good company to work with great atmosphere and ample room for improvement Learned a lot and coordinated with several departments while handling various projects

Title: Good place to work
